verses.text: \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w parables|strong="H4912"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w copied|strong="H6275"\w* \w out|strong="H0376"\w*.

It \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w conceal|strong="H5641"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w search|strong="H2713"\w* \w out|strong="H2713"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w speech|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0776"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* beneath, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* unsearchable.

\w Take|strong="H3318"\w* \w away|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* rust \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* there \w shall|strong="H3701"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* most \w pure|strong="H6884"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*:

\w Take|strong="H1898"\w* \w away|strong="H1898"\w* wickedness \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*.

Appear \w not|strong="H0408"\w* glorious \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w men|strong="H1419"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee: \w Come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* hither; \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou shouldst \w be|strong="H5869"\w* humbled \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prince|strong="H5081"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* things \w which|strong="H4100"\w* thy eyes \w have|strong="H7378"\w* seen, utter \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w hastily|strong="H7378"\w* \w in|strong="H7453"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w quarrel|strong="H7378"\w*: \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w afterward|strong="H0319"\w* thou mayst \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* able \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* amends, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* thou hast dishonoured thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*.

Treat thy \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thy \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H7453"\w* discover \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w secret|strong="H5475"\w* \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w a|strong="H7378"\w* stranger:

\w Lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* insult over thee, \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* cease \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* upbraid thee. Grace \w and|strong="H7725"\w* friendship deliver \w a|strong="H8085"\w* man: \w keep|strong="H8085"\w* these \w for|strong="H3808"\w* thyself, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* thou fall under reproach.

\w To|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w due|strong="H5921"\w* time, \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w like|strong="H3701"\w* \w apples|strong="H8598"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* beds \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w As|strong="H2091"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* \w earring|strong="H5141"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* bright pearl, \w so|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* reproveth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, \w and|strong="H2091"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*.

\w As|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* cold \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w messenger|strong="H6735"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* refresheth \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0376"\w* clouds, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w when|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* followeth, \w so|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H7307"\w* boasteth, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* doth \w not|strong="H0369"\w* fulfill \w his|strong="H0376"\w* promises.

\w By|strong="H0753"\w* patience \w a|strong="H7665"\w* prince \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w be|strong="H7665"\w* appeased, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w a|strong="H7665"\w* \w soft|strong="H7390"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* hardness.

Thou hast \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w what|strong="H1767"\w* \w is|strong="H4672"\w* \w sufficient|strong="H1767"\w* \w for|strong="H0398"\w* thee, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w being|strong="H7646"\w* \w glutted|strong="H7646"\w* therewith thou \w vomit|strong="H6958"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w up|strong="H0398"\w*.

Withdraw thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w from|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H6435"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* thy neighbour, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* having \w his|strong="H8130"\w* \w fill|strong="H7646"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee.

\w A|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H2719"\w* beareth \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* neighbour, \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w like|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* dart \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0376"\w* \w sharp|strong="H8150"\w* \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w*.

\w To|strong="H3117"\w* \w trust|strong="H4009"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* an unfaithful man \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H7272"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* rotten \w tooth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* weary \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* one \w that|strong="H3117"\w* looseth \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w cold|strong="H7135"\w* weather. \w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* nitre, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* singeth \w songs|strong="H7892"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* very \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*. \w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* moth doth \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* worm \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wood: \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sadness \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* man consumeth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thy \w enemy|strong="H8130"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* thirst, \w give|strong="H8248"\w* \w him|strong="H8130"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w heap|strong="H2846"\w* \w hot|strong="H1513"\w* \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w reward|strong="H7999"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* driveth away \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*, \w as|strong="H6440"\w* doth \w a|strong="H6440"\w* sad \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H6440"\w* backbiting \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w corner|strong="H6438"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w housetop|strong="H1406"\w*, \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* brawling \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* common \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w As|strong="H5315"\w* \w cold|strong="H7119"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* thirsty \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w so|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w A|strong="H6440"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* falling \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H6440"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* troubled \w with|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* foot, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H6440"\w* \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* \w spring|strong="H4599"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* man \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* searcher \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w majesty|strong="H3519"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* overwhelmed \w by|strong="H0398"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* lieth open \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* compassed \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, \w so|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w cannot|strong="H0369"\w* refrain \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* speaking.
